name: starter-template-basic-javascript
description: Basic JavaScript project template for Phaser Editor 2D.

scripts.test: npm run test:e2e && npm run test:coverage || npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && npm run start-server && cypress run --e2e --headless --browser electron && npm run stop-server
scripts.build: npx nyc instrument --compact=false src instrumented && mkdir public/ -p && mkdir public/src/ -p && cp index.html public/ && cp -r instrumented/** public/src/ && cp -r lib public && cp -r assets public

author: Arian Fornaris <developers@phasereditor2d.com> (https://phasereditor2d.com/)
